Mobs

Mobs (Mobiles) are the mobile creatures that populate the dungeon in Remixed Dungeon. This includes enemies, NPCs, pets, and other characters that interact with the player.

Categories

  • Enemies - Hostile creatures that attack the player
  • NPCs - Non-player characters with special functions
  • Bosses - Powerful unique enemies
  • Pets/Companions - Creature allies that can be summoned or tamed

Mechanics

  • AI - How mobs make decisions
  • Stats - Mob statistics and combat parameters
  • Immunities - What effects mobs are immune to
  • Resistances - What effects mobs resist

Common Mobs

  • Rat
  • Skeleton
  • Goo
  • DM300
  • Yog

See Also

  • Items - Items that can be dropped by mobs
  • Combat - Combat mechanics involving mobs
